message: This proposal offers you a fair share of 250000$. I suggest we agree on this before the value decreases in future rounds.
This offer reflects the changing value of the money. I'm willing to compromise, but we need to move quickly before the value drops further.
Considering the decrease in value, I propose a split of 600000$ for me and 400000$ for you. Let's aim for a balance while maximizing our gains.
